column4: Hi I just installed ubuntu 10.04 Desktop and It very sluggish plus yahoo sticks in the new email command???
Can some one please help me with this!
Check <System <Administration <Additional Drivers
ok!
It says it is using proprietary drivers.
ok. Ok. ATI or Nvidia?
Open a console and type 'lspci | grep VGA' in it. Important: 'VGA' not 'vga'
ok!
minimec: it shows that the VGA nvidia
Do you have some info in [], like [GeForce 7600 GS] ?
Or easier. Paste the whole line
minimec: ok pasting
http://pastebin.com/RsbaTjNn
yeah I see how did you come up wiyh that name?
smallfoot:
well maybe you got small feet right:)

ok!
Your card seems to be a special integrated GPU. --> see following link 'Video decoding processes that could be accelerated' http://nouveau.freedesktop.org/wiki/XvMC
